quote.msg: The Lakers would prefer to add a second superstar through free agency but are willing to part with some combination of Brandon Ingram, Kyle Kuzma, and Lonzo Ball in order to obtain a franchise player.
At the moment, the value of Ball, Kuzma and Ingram probably isn’t even that high — all three players have struggled for stretches this season.
